title: Boy with a knife
brief_description: A powerful re-enactment of a case story from the files of a Los Angeles Youth Service Agency. Shows how a group worker attempts to reach a gang of boys who are headed for delinquency; he plans a preventative action and shows how he attempts to carry out the plans.
